nodes.text: Yhuli was a planet in the Yhuli system, a star system in the Jospro sector of the Outer Rim Territories. The planet was visited by the Kwa species sometime during their history, and the Kwa constructed a Star Temple on Yhuli's surface, though the Star Temple was not discovered until the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Thousands of years later, Generals Wuvnir and Tfin of the Alliance to Restore the Republic were captured by the bounty hunter Kal-tan-shi on Yhuli.
